properties.areaDesc: Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 9 at 12:20PM MST until January 10 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of up to
two inches below 5000 feet, and up to 4 inches above 5000 feet,
including Marias Pass.

* WHERE...Northern Rocky Mountain Front and Southern Rocky
Mountain Front.

* WHEN...Until midnight MST tonight.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT
